Description: Zoho Recruit is a cloud based applicant tracking system that’s built to provide diverse, end-to-end hiring solutions for staffing agencies, corporate HRs and temporary workforce.
Name: Zoho Recruit

Methods.Name: Update Contact
Methods.Description: Update an existing contact.

Methods.Name: List Updated Contacts
Methods.Description: List all updated contacts. Leaves through the True Exit if any Contacts are retrieved, else through the False Exit.

Methods.Description: Create a new contact.

Methods.Name: List Contacts By Email
Methods.Description: List all contacts using an email filter. Leaves through the True Exit if any Contact with the provided email are retrieved, else through the False Exit.
